mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.schedule_id AS "scheduleId", a.operation_no AS "operationNo", a.operation AS "operation", a.operation_scale AS "operationScale", a.operation_code AS "operationCode", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.visit_id AS "visitId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheduled_operation_name( id, schedule_id, operation_no, operation, operation_scale, operation_code, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date, patient_id, visit_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{scheduleId}, #{operationNo}, #{operation}, #{operationScale}, #{operationCode}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{patientId}, #{visitId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE scheduled_operation_name SET operation = #{operation}, operation_scale = #{operationScale}, operation_code = #{operationCode}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
